item.title: Sådan bliver du ved med at skrive bedre end kunstig intelligens
item.description: Therefore, in the future, you may be recognized more for your mistakes than for your “error-free” Danish. As technology advances, large language models have become increasingly sophisticated in generating text that can mimic human writing. However, there are still ways to differentiate your writing from text generated by a large language model. Here are some tips to help you stand out: Inject Personality and Emotion Injicer personlighed og følelser One of the biggest differences between human writing and text generated by a large language model is the presence of personality and emotion.

item.title: 100.000 gange årligt bruges mine tekster i undervisningen uden at jeg får en krone for det – og CopyDan kan ikke hjælpe mig
item.description: Alle siger at emnet er enormt vigtigt

item.title: Kan man crowdfunde et klimaleksikon?
item.description: Interessen for klima er stor - er villigheden til at betale for viden på området det også?
